code: export var Action={Left:"Left",FastDrop:"FastDrop",Pause:"Pause",Quit:"Quit",Right:"Right",Rotate:"Rotate",SlowDrop:"SlowDrop"};export var Key={ArrowUp:Action.Rotate,ArrowDown:Action.SlowDrop,ArrowLeft:Action.Left,ArrowRight:Action.Right,KeyQ:Action.Quit,KeyP:Action.Pause,Space:Action.FastDrop};export var actionIsDrop=function actionIsDrop(action){return[Action.SlowDrop,Action.FastDrop].includes(action);};export var actionForKey=function actionForKey(keyCode){return Key[keyCode];};
